original_text:
De Magorum
L’ultima novità della Giocaonline è De Magorum, una slot in cui quattro maghi sono impegnati in una sfida a colpi di free spin, moltiplicatori e simboli speciali!
Tema e grafica
Questa slot dell’italianissima Giocaonline utilizza come tema il mondo del fantasy e la galassia come ambientazione. I protagonisti sono quattro maghi con caratteristiche diverse: Septimus la bellezza, Palladio la saggezza, Vortiger la perfidia e Alabar la genialità.
La grafica ha lo stile dei cartoni animati, con colori vivaci e con un’alta definizione. A fare da sfondo c’è una musica piacevole e per nulla invadente. La consolle di gioco mostra diverse informazioni, come il numero delle linee di pagamento, la puntata per linea e quella totale. Attraverso un tasto apposito è possibile impostare la puntata massima in un colpo solo. Al centro si trova il tasto Gira e accanto c’è l’Autoplay, per far andare il gioco in maniera automatica!
Caratteristiche della slot
La Giocaonline ha puntato su una griglia dal taglio tradizionale con cinque rulli e tre righe. È possibile puntare da un minimo di 0,01 € su ognuna delle 30 linee di pagamento, ciò vuol dire che uno Spin costerà appena 0,30 €. Per chi invece ama il brivido del rischio, può decidere di scommettere sino a un massimo di 1 € per linea, 30 € a partita. La volatilità è media, mentre il valore RTP è del 94,38%.
Simboli e funzionalità
Diciamo subito che in De Magorum ci sono solo simboli tematici rappresentati dai maghi e dai loro oggetti magici. A partire dal valore più basso e procedendo verso il più alto troviamo il cappello di Septimus, la pozione di Alaba, l’anello di Vortiger e il ciondolo di Palladio. I 4 maghi sono invece i simboli di maggior valore. Per fare un esempio, con 5 simboli di Septimer si guadagna 300 volte la puntata, con Alaba 400, con Vortiger 500 e con Palladio ben 1.000! Abbiamo poi i 3 simboli speciali. Il libro rappresenta il Wild. Oltre ad essere pagante, esso ha funge da Jolly, andando a sostituire tutti i simboli regolari ma non quelli speciali.
Abbiamo poi il simbolo Scatter. Anche ad esso è associata una ricompensa in denaro, seppur più bassa di quella che si ottiene con il simbolo Wild. È rappresentato da un bastone magico e ha la funzione di moltiplicare le vincite. C’è poi la sfera di cristallo che può comparire solo sui rulli 2, 3 e 4 e regala 3 giri gratuiti. Prima di cominciare il gioco Bonus, il giocatore dovrà scegliere un mago a cui sono associati 5, 7, 9 o 11 giri gratuiti. In seguito, si avrà la possibilità di scegliere uno degli oggetti magici e ottenere così un moltiplicatore pari a 2x, 3x, 4x o 5x. Se durante i giri gratuiti ricompariranno 3 sfere di cristallo, allora si avrà diritto a 8 ulteriori giri gratuiti sino a un massimo di 100. Durante i nuovi Free Spins il moltiplicatore rimarrà lo stesso.

raw_translation.response:
De Magorum: The Latest Gem from Giocaonline

Enter the world of fantasy and challenge four magicians in a battle of free spins, multipliers, and special symbols in Giocaonline's latest slot sensation, De Magorum. With high-definition graphics and a pleasant soundtrack, this Italian-made slot game features four distinct characters: the sharp beauty, Septimus; the wise Palladio; the treacherous Vortiger; and the brilliant Alabar.

Boasting traditional gameplay with five reels and thirty paylines, De Magorum offers a wide range of betting options, from a minimum of 0.01 € per line to a maximum of 1 € per line, for a total bet of 30 €. With medium volatility and an impressive RTP of 94.38%, this game is designed to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Featuring only thematic symbols, De Magorum boasts a variety of magical props, including Septimus's hat, Alaba's potion, Vortiger's ring, and Palladio's pendant. The four magicians, themselves the highest-paying symbols, offer impressive rewards, with up to 300 times your bet for Septimer and a whopping 1,000 times your bet for Palladio.

But that's not all; De Magorum offers three special symbols, including the Wild represented by a book, which replaces all regular symbols and pays out generously. The Scatter, represented by a magical staff, also provides financial rewards and multiplies your winnings. And to top it all off, the crystal sphere, which appears only on reels 2, 3, and 4, awards three free spins.

Before the Bonus Game begins, players must select a magician and receive between 5 and 11 free spins. Next, players can choose one of the magical props for an additional multiplier of 2x to 5x. Collecting three crystal spheres during the free spins awards up to eight additional spins, for a total of 100. And with a constant multiplier, the free spins can be incredibly rewarding.

Overall, De Magorum is a stunning, high-risk, high-reward game that offers a unique and immersive experience for any experienced gambler. Don't miss out on this magical opportunity– try your luck today!

raw_translation.response:
De Magorum: A Spellbinding Slot Game Review

De Magorum, the latest addition from Giocaonline, is a great slot game that pits four magical wizards against each other in a battle of free spins, multipliers, and special symbols. Take a trip into a fantasy world and explore the galaxy with this vibrantly colored cartoon-style slot that is sure to become an instant classic.

The four wizards- Septimus, Palladio, Vortiger, and Alabar- each have their own unique abilities and features that add an exciting dimension to this game. The graphics are truly stunning and the music is pleasing to the ear, but not so intense that it distracts from the gameplay.

The traditional layout of five reels and three rows is perfect for both new and experienced players, with a range of betting options from as little as 0.01 € on each of the 30 paylines to the more daring wagers of up to 1 € per line and 30 € per spin. The volatility of this game is intermediate, with an RTP of 94.38% that keeps you coming back for more.

The symbols in the game all tie in with the magical wizard theme, with lower value symbols such as Septimus' hat and Alaba's potion and higher value symbols including the wizards themselves. With up to 1,000x your stake available for the Palladio symbol, there are ample opportunities to win big.

The Wild symbol is represented by a book and can substitute for any regular symbol, while the Scatter symbol, represented by a magic wand, multiplies your winnings. In addition, the crystal ball can earn you 3 free spins if it appears on reels 2, 3, or 4, and has an additional bonus round where you must choose a wizard to earn up to 11 free spins and a multiplier of 2x, 3x, 4x, or 5x. 

Overall, De Magorum is a truly magical experience that is sure to delight all players, both experienced and new. Don't miss your chance to enter the fantasy world created by Giocaonline in this fantastic slot game.

Review: De Magorum: The Latest Gem from Giocaonline

Enter the world of fantasy and challenge four magicians in a battle of free spins, multipliers, and special symbols in Giocaonline's latest slot sensation, De Magorum. With high-definition graphics and a pleasant soundtrack, this Italian-made slot game features four distinct characters: the sharp beauty, Septimus; the wise Palladio; the treacherous Vortiger; and the brilliant Alabar.

Boasting traditional gameplay with five reels and thirty paylines, De Magorum offers a wide range of betting options, from a minimum of 0.01 € per line to a maximum of 1 € per line, for a total bet of 30 €. With medium volatility and an impressive RTP of 94.38%, this game is designed to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Featuring only thematic symbols, De Magorum boasts a variety of magical props, including Septimus's hat, Alaba's potion, Vortiger's ring, and Palladio's pendant. The four magicians, themselves the highest-paying symbols, offer impressive rewards, with up to 300 times your bet for Septimer and a whopping 1,000 times your bet for Palladio.

But that's not all; De Magorum offers three special symbols, including the Wild represented by a book, which replaces all regular symbols and pays out generously. The Scatter, represented by a magical staff, also provides financial rewards and multiplies your winnings. And to top it all off, the crystal sphere, which appears only on reels 2, 3, and 4, awards three free spins.

Before the Bonus Game begins, players must select a magician and receive between 5 and 11 free spins. Next, players can choose one of the magical props for an additional multiplier of 2x to 5x. Collecting three crystal spheres during the free spins awards up to eight additional spins, for a total of 100. And with a constant multiplier, the free spins can be incredibly rewarding.

Overall, De Magorum is a stunning, high-risk, high-reward game that offers a unique and immersive experience for any experienced gambler. Don't miss out on this magical opportunity– try your luck today!

response.headline: Gameplay
response.content:
If you're looking for a traditional slot game experience, De Magorum has got you covered. With five reels and thirty paylines, this game offers plenty of chances to hit it big. And if you're not one to go all in, the minimum betting option of 0.01 € per line is perfect for penny-pinchers like myself. Of course, if you're feeling lucky, why not try the maximum betting option of 1 € per line? Who knows, you might just be the next big winner!

And let's not forget about the game's medium volatility and impressive RTP of 94.38%. For those unfamiliar with the terms, medium volatility means that you can expect a good mix of small and large payouts throughout your gameplay experience. And an RTP of 94.38%? That's music to any slot game lover's ears. It means that for every €100 you bet, you can expect to get back €94.38 in winnings. Not too shabby, if you ask me.

All in all, De Magorum offers a classic slot game experience with some serious potential for big rewards. Whether you're a seasoned slot game player or just looking for some casual entertainment, this game is definitely worth a spin.

The magicians offer impressive payouts, with up to 300 times the bet for Septimer and a whopping 1,000 times the bet for Palladio. The Wild and Scatter symbols also offer generous payouts.

Review: De Magorum: The Latest Gem from Giocaonline

Enter the world of fantasy and challenge four magicians in a battle of free spins, multipliers, and special symbols in Giocaonline's latest slot sensation, De Magorum. With high-definition graphics and a pleasant soundtrack, this Italian-made slot game features four distinct characters: the sharp beauty, Septimus; the wise Palladio; the treacherous Vortiger; and the brilliant Alabar.

Boasting traditional gameplay with five reels and thirty paylines, De Magorum offers a wide range of betting options, from a minimum of 0.01 € per line to a maximum of 1 € per line, for a total bet of 30 €. With medium volatility and an impressive RTP of 94.38%, this game is designed to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Featuring only thematic symbols, De Magorum boasts a variety of magical props, including Septimus's hat, Alaba's potion, Vortiger's ring, and Palladio's pendant. The four magicians, themselves the highest-paying symbols, offer impressive rewards, with up to 300 times your bet for Septimer and a whopping 1,000 times your bet for Palladio.

But that's not all; De Magorum offers three special symbols, including the Wild represented by a book, which replaces all regular symbols and pays out generously. The Scatter, represented by a magical staff, also provides financial rewards and multiplies your winnings. And to top it all off, the crystal sphere, which appears only on reels 2, 3, and 4, awards three free spins.

Before the Bonus Game begins, players must select a magician and receive between 5 and 11 free spins. Next, players can choose one of the magical props for an additional multiplier of 2x to 5x. Collecting three crystal spheres during the free spins awards up to eight additional spins, for a total of 100. And with a constant multiplier, the free spins can be incredibly rewarding.

Overall, De Magorum is a stunning, high-risk, high-reward game that offers a unique and immersive experience for any experienced gambler. Don't miss out on this magical opportunity– try your luck today!
